column5: There was sure a lot of action at the fish ladder Friday evening. Its good to see they have hung belting on either side of the ladder. The rainbows and salmon in the fall can really smack the concrete when they miss the entrance.

When that water hits 42.3 watch the majic. Right now they jump in the ladder and fall back out. Very few will make it over.  When that temp. gets right they clear that ladder like it's no their.  I think Lawson has a picture of the 1st rainbow we seen clear the ladder (1988).
